games.title: Age of Tanks Warriors: TD War
games.description:
Lead Your Tank Warriors to Glory Across Time!
Welcome to Age of Tank Warriors: TD War, the ultimate tank warriors strategy game! Travel through the ages of war, leading your tank army from Stone Age warriors to the sci-fi space future. Upgrade your battle tanks, engage in intense Clash of Tank Warriors battles, and use tower defense (TD) strategy to conquer every era. 100vs100 survival battles await‚Äîwill you rewrite history and become the greatest tank warlord?
games.howToPlayText:
Age of Tanks Warriors is a one-click battle game, so the actual combat portion of the game is fairly simple. The difficulty lies in the strategy of how you use your army and weapons to kill off your opponents before they kill you and destroy your fortress. Once you do this, you get to upgrade your army and weapons for an even more effective strategy.

The game begins with your stone cave, which is directly opposite your opponent's cave. You can deploy your soldiers by clicking the small icon on the bottom right of your screen. The only hitch is that you may not have enough soldiers to send out in time to match your opponent's troop!

Your task on each level is to defeat the opposing army and destroy their shelter. As the levels advance, so do the fortresses, making it even more difficult throughout the ages. Fighting begins with sticks and stones but eventually turns into tanks and artillery.

games.title: Italian Brainrot Find the Difference
games.description:
Italian Brainrot: Find the Difference is a fast, funny, and bizarre puzzle game where absurdity meets sharp-eyed fun. Each of the 30 levels features two nearly identical images‚Äîbut with small, sneaky changes hidden in plain sight.

Designed especially for kids, this game brings together cartoon chaos and visual brain-training in a way that‚Äôs goofy, creative, and totally unforgettable. You‚Äôre not just spotting differences‚Äîyou‚Äôre diving into a wild universe full of absurd characters and hilarious scenes.

üß† How It Works
30 handcrafted levels with detailed, funny illustrations
Each level has 5 differences to find
No timers, no pressure‚Äîperfect for kids and families
Play directly in-browser on mobile or desktop
üé≠ Key Characters in the Italian Brainrot Universe
Tralalero Tralala
A three-legged shark always rocking bright Nike sneakers. Whether he's leaping through chaos or fighting with Bombardino Crocodilo, he's full of attitude and absurd energy.

Bombardino Crocodilo
A crocodile-headed creature with the body of a WWII bomber plane. He drops more confusion than bombs and makes every level feel like a fever dream.

Tung Tung
A living, walking wooden drum (inspired by Indonesian bedug) with a baseball bat. While sometimes mistaken as Italian Brainrot, he‚Äôs a crossover character who adds international flair to the madness.

Ballerina Cappuccina
A graceful dancer with a cappuccino cup for a head. She pirouettes through scenes of total nonsense, highlighting the game‚Äôs charming chaos
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop Controls:
Mouse Click: Click on the difference.

üì± Mobile Controls:
Tap: Tap on the difference.

ü§™ Bonus Tips:
Some differences are sneaky‚Äîlook for color swaps, missing items, or silly changes.

No timer‚Äîplay at your own pace.

Each level gets more bizarre, so keep those eyes sharp!

games.title: One Man Army: Battle Game
games.description: One Man Army: A casual single player Battle Game that will test your warrior skills and battle reflexes. With challenging levels and intense battles, you must use your tactical skills to survive and defend against arrows, canon, and even dragon flames.
games.howToPlayText:
Are you ready for the fun challenge in this defensive battle strategy game? One Man Army: Battle Game puts you in the shoes of an unstoppable warrior defending yourself and testing your reflexes against enemy attacks. With a variety of skills and upgrades at your disposal, you can upgrade your armory and become an unstoppable force.

As a One Man Army, you must use your battle tactics to defend and survive enemy attacks. The game tests your reflexes and strategic skills as you face wave after wave of enemy soldier's attacks. You must be quick on your feet, using the right tactics to outsmart your opponents and emerge victorious.

With each battle won you earn points to rank up, upgrade your armory and enhance your battle skills. Armory upgrades include everything from new weapons and armor to protective gear and shields. By climbing up the ranks you claim them all to be a champion battle warrior.

One Man Army: Battle Game will test your warrior skills and battle reflexes. With challenging levels and intense battles, you must use your tactical skills to survive and defend against arrows, canon, and even dragon flames.

games.title: Go Up
games.description:
Welcome to Go Up, the exciting free mobile game that challenges you to protect the balloon as it rises higher and higher into the sky. Get ready to put your skills to the ultimate test with this amazing balloon game that'll keep you on your toes and your eyes glued to the screen.

Picture this. You have a tiny balloon you need to protect. You need to push away all the pointy and heavy things that get in the way of your balloon going up. But it's not that easy. The sky is full of all kinds of strange things like blocks, beams, and triangles. If your balloon even touches one of these, it's all over. Exciting, right?

But it gets even better! The higher your balloon goes, the harder the game gets. The obstacles become trickier and more difficult to avoid. You can push everything out of the way, but watch out! If you send blocks flying everywhere, you will find it difficult to protect the balloon.

games.description:
As the most relaxing and addictive color sorting game, this ball puzzle is designed to entertain and sharpen your mind at the same time. While sorting the colored balls to fill each bottle with the same color, the relaxation it brings will relieve stress and distract you from your daily worries.

This classic color sorting game is pretty simple to play, but hard to master. Just tap to take a colored ball from one bottle and stack it into another bottle, until all balls of the same color are in the same bottle. However, there are thousands of puzzles of varying difficulty. The more challenging the puzzles you play, the more careful you need to be with each move. Each move cannot be taken lightly, or you may get stuck! This Ball Sort game is definitely the best puzzle game for you to exercise your brain and train your logical thinking.
games.howToPlayText:
Tap any bottle to pick up the top ball, then tap another bottle to move the ball into it.
You can only stack the ball into a bottle with the same color ball on top and enough space.
When balls of the same color are sorted into a single bottle, you win!
Each bottle can only be placed with 4 balls.
Use "Undo" to go back to previous steps.
Add an extra bottle if you get stuck.
You can restart the current level at any time.

games.title: Maths Puzzle
games.description: Maths Puzzle is a fun and engaging logic-based game that challenges your mathematical skills and problem-solving abilities. With a variety of puzzles that range in difficulty, this game is perfect for anyone looking to improve their mental agility and enjoy a fun, educational experience. Your task is to solve mathematical equations by figuring out the missing numbers, symbols, or operations in order to make both sides of the equation equal. The puzzles come with increasing complexity, so you‚Äôll need both strategy and quick thinking to succeed.
games.howToPlayText:
Objective: Your goal is to solve the math puzzle by filling in the missing numbers or operations to make the equation correct.

Start the Game: Click on the puzzle to begin. You‚Äôll be presented with an equation that is missing some parts (numbers or operators).

Solve the Puzzle: Use your knowledge of basic arithmetic (addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division) to complete the puzzle. You may need to fill in missing numbers or choose the correct mathematical operators to balance both sides of the equation.

Hints: If you're stuck, some versions of the game offer hints that help guide you towards the solution. Use them wisely to avoid wasting moves.

Levels: As you progress, the difficulty will increase. New challenges such as more complex equations or multiple missing elements will keep you on your toes.

Time and Scoring: Depending on the version of the game, you may be timed, so solving the puzzles quickly could earn you more points or rewards.

Winning the Game: Successfully solve a series of puzzles to move to the next level. Keep going to challenge your brain and improve your math skills.

games.title: Stack Master
games.description:
Stack master is a minimalistic, endless stacking game where your goal is to build the tower as high as possible by perfectly aligning moving blocks.
The graphics are simple and clean, focusing on smooth gameplay without distractions.
You compete globally for the highest score (tower height) on leaderboards.
games.howToPlayText:
When you start, a block (or ‚Äúslice‚Äù) begins sliding horizontally across the screen at some height.
You tap the screen (or tap a control) to drop the moving block onto the block beneath it.
The better the alignment with the block below, the more of the block remains. If part of the block overhangs, the overhanging part is cut off.
If you drop with a slight misalignment, the excess portion is cut away and removed, making your next block smaller.
If your misalignment is very poor (i.e. almost no overlap), you might lose the block entirely, ending the game.
Each successful drop continues the tower upward. The goal is to stack as many as possible, reaching the highest possible height (score).
As the tower gets higher, it becomes more challenging. The blocks may move faster or require more precision. (This is common in stacking games of this type.)

games.title: Lost Adventure
games.description:
"Survivors of a mid-air crash find themselves in a mysterious land. The pilot, amidst crafting, mining, and solving puzzles, works tirelessly to save passengers stranded on separate islands in the wild grass. Can they conquer the challenges, reunite, and escape the enigmatic realm before the unknown dangers lurking in the wilderness engulf them all?"

Embark on a thrilling adventure after a plane crash strands you in a mysterious, wild land. As the pilot, you must gather resources from wreckage, craft tools, and navigate through the wild grass to rescue scattered passengers on small islands.

Explore ancient ruins, solve puzzles, and mine resources to unlock the secrets of this enigmatic realm. Encounter friendly and hostile creatures, and use your crafted weapons to survive. Communicate with other survivors, separated by streams and dense vegetation, through makeshift signals.

Your journey is a test of resilience and camaraderie. Each crafted item brings you closer to reuniting with your fellow survivors and discovering the way back home. Will you conquer the challenges of the wild grass and unveil the mysteries hidden within, or succumb to the unknown dangers that lurk in the shadows? The choice is yours in this gripping and immersive adventure!
games.howToPlayText:
Become a True Survivor!
Step into the role of a skilled pilot whose plane has crash-landed on an uncharted island‚Äîone that doesn‚Äôt exist on any Earth map. In this gripping RPG survival adventure, your mission is clear: find and rescue every passenger, brave the unknown, and uncover the island‚Äôs secrets.

Scavenge for resources, battle mysterious threats, and lead your group to safety. Rebuild what‚Äôs broken, forge alliances, and piece together a way off the island. Every choice matters, and survival depends on your courage, cunning, and determination.

Can you reunite your crew, outsmart the dangers, and escape the island that time forgot?

games.description: Play Checkers, the classic two-player board game! Make diagonal moves, eliminate opponents, and crown your piece as a king. Challenge the computer, a local player, or opponents worldwide in this exciting Italian Checkers version!
games.howToPlayText:
Moves are only allowed on dark squares, so pieces always move diagonally. Single pieces are always restricted to moving forward (towards the opponent).
Capture pieces by jumping.
A piece that makes a capture (jump) jumps over one of the opponent's pieces and lands in a straight diagonal line on the other side. Only one piece can be captured in one jump; however, multiple jumps are allowed in one move.
Jumps (or captures) are mandatory.
If a player can make a capture, the jump must be made.

When a piece reaches the furthest row from the player who controls it, it becomes a king and can move either forward or backward.

games.title: Queens Royal: Sudoku Puzzle
games.description:
Rule the Grid with Royal Precision!

Queens Royal reimagines the classic eight queens logic puzzle into a modern masterpiece, where elegance meets relentless brain-teasing challenges. Place your queens wisely, strategize every move, and conquer 5,000+ levels of mind-bending puzzles designed to test your intellect and crown you the ultimate ruler of logic!

Why Queen Royal Will Captivate You
- Brain-Training Excellence: Sharpen logic, strategy, and problem-solving skills with puzzles that evolve in complexity.
- Sleek & Serene Design: Minimalistic visuals and soothing colors keep your focus on the challenge, not clutter.
- Daily Reign Challenges: Fresh puzzles and timed events with endless variety.

Features Fit for a Monarch
- 5,000+ Levels: From gentle warm-ups to expert-tier enigmas, every puzzle is a new conquest.
- Smart Hints: Stuck? Use hints to nudge your strategy without spoiling the thrill.
- Endless Mode: Infinite levels mode lets you relax and strategize stress-free.
- Elegant Tutorials: Learn the rules in seconds‚Äîmastery takes a lifetime.

A Puzzle Game That Earns Your Crown
Easy to learn, impossible to put down. Queen Royal is the perfect blend of simplicity and obsession. Whether you‚Äôre a chess pro, a sudoku savant, or a casual gamer seeking a mental spark, Queen Royal offers a regal challenge that grows with you. Outthink the grid, outmaneuver the rules, and reign supreme in a world where every victory feels legendary.
games.howToPlayText:
Rule the Grid with Royal Precision! In this elegant brain-teaser, your logic and strategy will be tested as you place your queens to conquer the board. With thousands of mind-bending puzzles, each move counts on your path to becoming the ultimate ruler of logic!

Game Objective:
 - The goal is to place one queen in every row, column, and color-designated zone on the grid.

Rules:
 - One Queen Per Realm: You must place exactly one queen in each row, column, and color zone.
 - No Touching Crowns: Queens cannot be placed in squares that touch each other, including diagonally.
 - Unique Solution: Every level is designed to have only one correct solution, so no guessing is required!

games.title: Bullet Echo
games.description:
Lead your team to victory in this unique PvP tactical team shooter! Choose from dozens of different heroes with unique play styles and abilities. Unite with friends, set a strategy, and be the last team standing when the battle ends. Your vision is limited by the beam of a flashlight, but you can hear enemies' steps and shots. Unlock and upgrade new heroes, participate in championships, and fight to unlock new perks, maps, and game modes!

Bullet Echo ‚Äî Game Description
Bullet Echo is a tactical, team-based PvP shooter with a unique top-down perspective, developed by ZeptoLab. The game stands out for its stealth-focused gameplay, fast-paced battles, and emphasis on teamwork.

Key Features
Unique Tactical Stealth Action:
Your vision is limited by the beam of a flashlight, but you can hear enemies' steps and shots. This creates suspenseful, strategic encounters where sound and positioning are crucial.

Team Play and Strategy:
Play with friends or match with players worldwide. Unite your team, set a strategy, and be the last team standing. The level of your hero is matched with the highest in your party, making it easy to play with friends of any experience.

Diverse Heroes:
Choose from dozens of different heroes, each with unique play styles, weapons, and abilities. Unlock and upgrade heroes to boost their power and unlock new perks.

Multiple Game Modes:

Battle Royale: Five teams of three players each compete to be the last team standing on a shrinking map.

Team vs Team: Two teams of five players face off on exclusive maps.

King of the Hill: Solo mode with 15 players battling for survival.

Additional modes and maps are available as you progress.

Progression and Rewards:
Participate in championships, accomplish missions, and receive valuable resources. Unlock new heroes, perks, maps, and game modes as you play.

Gameplay Overview
Top-Down Shooter:
The game uses a top-down view, giving players an aerial perspective of the battlefield. Stealth, quick reflexes, and tactical movement are essential.

Auto-Shooting:
Heroes automatically fire when an enemy enters their firing cone, allowing players to focus on movement and positioning.

Looting:
Collect weapons, ammo, armor, and power-ups during matches to enhance your hero‚Äôs abilities.

Revive System:
Teammates can revive each other during battles, adding another layer of teamwork and strategy.
games.howToPlayText:
Main Objectives
Team up with friends or play solo to compete in tactical PvP battles.

Survive and eliminate enemy teams using stealth, strategy, and your hero‚Äôs unique abilities.

Collect loot and power-ups to strengthen your hero during each match.

Be the last team or player standing to win the round.

Desktop Controls (if playing via emulator or official desktop version)
Note: Bullet Echo is primarily a mobile game, but can be played on PC via Android emulators. Controls may vary depending on emulator settings.

W, A, S, D / Arrow Keys: Move your hero.

Mouse: Aim your flashlight cone (direction of vision).

Left Mouse Button: Use hero‚Äôs special ability (if mapped).

Spacebar: Interact with objects or revive teammates (if mapped).

Esc: Open game menu or pause.

You can customize key bindings in most emulators for optimal comfort.

Mobile Controls
Virtual Joystick (Left side): Move your hero around the map.

Swipe / Drag (Right side): Aim your flashlight and field of vision.

Ability Button: Tap to activate your hero‚Äôs special ability.

Interact Button: Tap to pick up items, open chests, or revive teammates.

Auto-Shoot: Your hero fires automatically when an enemy enters your cone of vision.

Tips for Success
Use walls and obstacles for cover and to ambush enemies.

Listen for enemy footsteps and gunfire to locate opponents in the fog of war.

Stick with your team for better chances of survival and to revive each other.

Upgrade and experiment with different heroes to find your best play style.

Master the controls and tactics to dominate the arena in Bullet Echo!

games.title: Drone Dash - Time Challenges!
games.description:
**How to Play**

Welcome to **Drone Dash - Time Challenges** ‚Äì a fast-paced arcade puzzler where quick thinking and precision bouncing are the keys to victory! You‚Äôll control a zippy little drone that *dashes* between walls and platforms like a high-tech pinball. But this isn‚Äôt your typical platformer ‚Äì no jumping, no gravity drops. Your drone glides and ricochets from surface to surface, smoothly darting through tight spaces full of traps and twists.

Your mission? **Collect as many bullets as you can before time runs out!** The more you grab, the more stars you‚Äôll earn (up to 3 per level). Once you collect the minimum required, a glowing crystal spawns back at your starting point ‚Äì reach it to complete the level. But watch out! Hit a trap or run out of time, and it's back to the start.

Levels are short, intense, and packed with surprises. New traps and tricky tiles will keep you on your toes as you dash your way to perfection. Fast reflexes and smart movement make all the difference!

**Controls:**
üñ±Ô∏è On PC: Just click to bounce your drone in the direction of your choice!
üì± On Mobile: Just tap to bounce your drone in the direction of your choice!

Ready to test your reflexes and grab those stars? Dive into the dash and beat the clock!

games.howToPlayText: To play 4 color card game on a desktop, use your mouse to interact with the cards. Your hand appears at the bottom of the screen. The object of the game is to predict whether the sum of the dice will be the exact number of even or odd numbers. Each turn brings an element of chance and strategy, as players must take into account previous rolls and try to guess when luck will be on their side.

Bright and memorable characters will keep you entertained, and simple game controls allow you to focus on battling countless hordes of pigeons, rats, aliens, crocodiles, and other animals. Can you collect weapons in battle and unlock all available maps? Two playable characters to choose from.
games.howToPlayText:
Furry Kung Fu is a fun fighting game with cute cartoon graphics. You play as Catsei or his student Kung Fu Cat. You need to hit the opponent with a lot of punches, while dodging all kinds of objects flying at you, such as balls, comets, fire and pots. It's so much fun!

Engage in an epic Kung Fu battle with your opponent. Get coins, unlock player skins and new weapons!

Bright and memorable characters will keep you entertained, and simple game controls allow you to focus on battling countless hordes of pigeons, rats, aliens, crocodiles, and other animals. Can you collect weapons in battle and unlock all available maps? Two playable characters to choose from
–ö–∞–∫ –∏–≥—Ä–∞—Ç—å
Control on the PC: by arrow buttons, on the smartphone - by swipes and taps on the screen.

Swipe: left/right arrow, tap on the screen to the left/right of the player.
Combo: repeatedly pressing the button in the direction where you want to apply a combo / multiple tap to the left or right of the player.
Sit down: down arrow / swipe down.
Jump: arrow up / swipe up.
Double jump (if available for a specific skin): double arrow up / two swipe up

Uppercut - squat and jump, arrow down and up / swipe down and up;
Attack from above - press the down arrow / swipe down while jumping.

The enemies drop weapons and lives. You can pick them up by tapping/tapping in their direction.

The enemy on the ball and comet can be shot down. The rat in the window can be turned off briefly by throwing a weapon at it.
Levels in the Survival game mode are unlocked as you progress through the main Campaign.

Perfect for vocabulary building, brain training, and improving spelling skills, this game offers endless fun and challenges.

games.description:
Welcome to Screw Jam Puzzle, where the challenge of unscrewing puzzles and sorting colorful screws, pins, and nuts takes center stage! Dive into an immersive world of wood and bolts, where every unscrew brings you closer to solving the ultimate screw pin jam puzzle. With each twist, you'll match colors and sort nuts and bolts to clear your path through tricky levels.

Tackle hundreds of unique levels designed to test your logic and strategy. As you unscrew, sort, and solve puzzles, you‚Äôll face new and exciting screw pin jam challenges. Unlock levels, refine your skills, and enjoy the thrill of unscrewing complex puzzles while earning rewards along the way. Every level brings a fresh twist on the classic nuts and bolts puzzle adventure.Prepare for a jam-packed puzzle experience, where you‚Äôll navigate wood structures, solve unscrew puzzles, and discover new mechanics with every update. Whether you're into sorting colors or untangling nuts and bolts, Screw Jam offers a puzzle experience that will keep you hooked.

Challenges: Some levels come with special challenges that offer additional rewards upon completion.
Lives System: Players have a limited number of lives. Losing all lives may require waiting or watching ads to continue.

games.title: Dice Puzzle
games.description: Dice Puzzle is a puzzle game where your task is to strategically place numbered cubes on the board, aiming to merge three adjacent cubes with the same number. As they combine, their value increases. Carefully select cubes with different points, considering their placement to match with others effectively. Be mindful, as cubes may appear individually or in pairs. Merge three or more dice horizontally or vertically to create higher-valued cubes. Utilize the storage space wisely to save cubes for later use. Test your puzzle-solving skills in this engaging dice-merging game!
games.howToPlayText:
Select a die (or a pair) from your tray and drag it onto the grid where it fits.
Tap the dice in the tray to rotate them before placing, especially helpful for pairs
When three or more dice of the same face touch, whether horizontally or vertically (even diagonally adjacently), they automatically merge into one higher-value die

games.title: Sudoku
games.description:
The playing field is a grid with 9x9 cells, divided into smaller grids with a side of 3 cells. Thus, the entire playing field consists of 81 cells. At the beginning of the game, there are already some numbers in them (from 1 to 9). The player is required to fill in the free cells with numbers from 1 to 9 so that in each row, in each column and in each small 3 √ó3 square, each digit would occur only once.
There are multiple levels of difficulty you can choose. Beware of mistakes you can make.
games.howToPlayText: Click on the cell you want to fill and then click on a number you want there. You can click on the "Notes" button to mark possible numbers without placing them.

games.title: Cosmic Dash
games.description: Cosmic Dash is an endless space runner where you pilot your way across the solar system, dodging space junk, collecting tokens, and smashing asteroids. The core loop is simple‚Äîtravel as far as you can while managing jumps, shrinks, and speed boosts‚Äîbut what makes it stand out is its layered mechanics: shrinking lets you slip through debris, boosts let you destroy asteroids, and big tokens chain into massive rewards. The mix of fast reflex gameplay, mission objectives, and planetary backdrops gives it a fresh twist on the classic runner genre.
games.howToPlayText:
üéÆ How to Play Cosmic Dash

Your mission is to dash through space, travel as far as possible, and collect tokens while avoiding or destroying obstacles.

Controls (Keyboard):

Jump ‚Äì Press UP arrow

Shrink ‚Äì Press DOWN arrow to squeeze through tight gaps and space junk

Move ‚Äì Use LEFT / RIGHT arrows to change position

Boost ‚Äì Press SPACE to speed up and smash through asteroids

Controls (Touch / Mobile):

Jump ‚Äì Swipe UP

Shrink ‚Äì Swipe DOWN

Move ‚Äì Swipe LEFT / RIGHT

Boost ‚Äì Tap the screen


ü™ê Tips & Mechanics:

Collect small tokens to increase your score.

Grab BIG TOKENS to automatically pull in smaller ones.

Use SHRINK to slip past dangerous space junk.

Use BOOST to destroy glowing asteroids and clear the way.

The further you travel, the more challenging and rewarding the journey becomes.

Welcome to Squid Game Tower Defense ‚Äî a unique and thrilling game where you will battle against characters from the famous Squid Game show. Unlike traditional Tower Defense games, your task here is not to defend towers but to attack and fight enemies that reside within them.

Each tower is not just a structure; it's a place where dangerous characters are waiting for battle. You'll engage in a series of exciting fights, defeating enemies at every level and overcoming various challenges. The game features characters well-known to all fans of the show, each with its own unique abilities and characteristics.

Complete levels, improve your combat skills, gather valuable resources, and unlock new opportunities for your battles. Make sure that your strategic abilities help you defeat even the toughest enemies standing in your way. Enjoy fast-paced combat, challenging missions, and an atmosphere that immerses you into the world of Squid Game.

- For aiming click anywhere on the table and rotate the cue
- For precise aiming, turn the precision aim wheel on the right side of the screen, or aim the cue while holding down the Shift button if you play on PC
- To hit, click on the cue on the left side of the screen and pull towards the desired force of the blow, then release
- For screws, click on the ball icon with a dot in the upper right part of the screen, move the impact point and confirm the installation of the point by clicking on the green button. If you're playing on a PC, you can hold down the X button on your keyboard while aiming to move the point of impact
- To change the inclination of the cue, click on the cue ball icon at the top of the screen. In this mode, tap anywhere on the screen and raise the cue to the desired angle, then confirm the change by pressing the green button. If you play on a computer, you can hold down the Z button while aiming, this will also change the tilt of the cue.

Welcome to Grassland, an immersive exploration game set in a lush green land with dense grass.

You embark on an exciting journey to uncover hidden resources beneath the vibrant grasslands. Armed with your trusty grass cutter machine, you must navigate the vast landscape, gather resources, and expand your base to thrive in this unique environment.

Game Features:
-Explore the Verdant Grassland: Discover hidden treasures, and unique locations as you venture further into the unknown.
-Resource Gathering: Use your grass cutter machine to cut through the grass and uncover valuable resources. Collect wood, coal, and other precious items hidden beneath the surface. Each resource will play a crucial role in expanding your base and unlocking new upgrades.
-Base Building: Start with a small base and gradually expand it as you gather more resources. Build structures, markets, workshops, and storage facilities to support your exploration efforts. Customize your base to suit your playstyle and unlock new features to enhance your gameplay.
-Upgrade and Unlock New Features: Enhance your grass cutter machine by upgrading its strength, speed, and fuel capacity. Invest in advanced technology and tools to improve your efficiency in cutting grass and discovering resources.

Key Features:
-Vast and immersive grass-covered landscape to explore
-Satisfying Grass Cutting Effect
-Resource Gathering and Management
-Enjoy the immersive gameplay with a sense of exploration and discovery
-Immerse yourself in stunning visuals of the grassy landscape


Are you ready to wield your grass cutter machine and become the master of the grassy landscape? The journey awaits you in Grassland!

Looking for a game that is both challenging and relaxing? Look no further than "Nuts And Bolts Sort" - the ultimate brain training challenge that doubles as a stress-relieving escape.

The objective of this game is to sort bolts and nuts by type. While the gameplay mechanics are simple, the difficulty increases as you progress through the levels, and you'll need to rely on your brainpower to remember which bolts and nuts belong together.

With beautiful graphics, soothing sound effects, and ASMR elements, "Nuts And Bolts Sort" will keep you engaged and relaxed for hours. And if you're looking for a way to unwind after a stressful day, this game is the perfect way to do it.

-Free props to help you pass levels.

games.title: Mini Golf Battle
games.description:
Mini Golf Battle is a fun and casual mini golf challenge where your goal is simple: hit the ball into the hole with as few shots as possible. The game combines easy controls with tricky levels full of slopes, angles, and obstacles that test your timing and precision.
Each level is designed to get a little harder, so you‚Äôll need to aim carefully, control your shot power, and plan the best path to sink the ball. It‚Äôs a relaxing yet addictive golf experience made for quick play sessions.
games.howToPlayText:
Drag/swipe in the direction you want the ball to move.
Pull back and release to adjust the strength of your shot.
The longer you drag, the stronger the hit.
Try to sink the ball into the hole in the fewest strokes possible.
Watch out for walls, ramps, and barriers that can deflect your ball.
Use angles to bounce around corners smartly.

Fire Power:
This bonus gives your ball a flaming speed boost.
It‚Äôs useful for long straight shots or when you want to quickly cross a large gap.
Best used when you need maximum distance in a single strike.

Wing / Glide Power:
This bonus allows your ball to glide smoothly as if it has wings.
It reduces friction and gives your ball a longer travel path with better control.
Ideal for precision shots where you want distance but also don‚Äôt want to overshoot too wildly.

Spring / Bounce Power:
This bonus acts like a spring-loaded push.
It helps your ball bounce forward with extra force, perfect for overcoming obstacles or making tricky jumps.
Best for courses with barriers, ramps, or platforms where normal shots can‚Äôt reach.

games.title: Monster Slayer: Merge & Survive
games.description: Experience the excitement of Monster Slayer: Merge & Survive, a dynamic game where you merge items to craft powerful tools and potions. Test your strategy as you navigate dungeons. Play for free online on both mobile and desktop. Embrace your heroic side!
games.howToPlayText:
Welcome to our thrilling adventure game! Your journey consists of two main parts: merging items and exploring dungeons.

Merging Items 
In the lower part of the screen, you will find the merging grid. This is where you combine different items to gain various effects:
- Weapons: Merge different weapon parts to create powerful weapons that deal damage to enemies.
- Potions: Combine potions to restore health and boost your survivability.
- Keys: Merge keys to unlock chests scattered throughout the dungeon, which contain valuable loot.
- Coin Pouches: Collect and merge coin pouches to purchase new items from the shop and expand your inventory by buying travel bags from the merchant.

Dungeon Exploration 
In the upper part of the screen, your character moves through the dungeon level by level. Use the items you've merged to overcome challenges and defeat enemies as you delve deeper into the dungeon. 

Embark on this epic journey, combine powerful items, and conquer the depths of the dungeon!

games.title: StickerBall
games.description:
Stickerball is a fast-paced game where you collect stickers using a ball with unique abilities! Your goal is to collect 180 colorful stickers across 9 levels by completing challenges and activating triggers that change the game‚Äôs rules. Each turn, 10 stickers fly onto the field from a purchased pack, but any uncollected ones disappear‚Äîact quickly and precisely!

The game shines with 14 dynamic triggers: freeze stickers, double rewards with "x2," turn the ball into a magnet or ghost, activate "disco" mode, or control a dual ball! The more stickers you collect in one turn, the higher your combo and the more coins you earn. Holo-stickers, with their unique designs, grant double the currency!

Play across 12 vibrant, randomly changing fields. Buy sticker packs, upgrade your collection, and strategize by activating triggers at the perfect moment to maximize rewards.
games.howToPlayText:
How to play:
1. Aiming:
Move your cursor to aim-the arrow on the ball shows the strike direction.

2. Power Charging:
Hold LMB to fill the arrow‚Äôs power gauge. Release to launch the ball! Striking too early cancels the shot.

3. Collecting Stickers:
After striking, the ball bounces off walls, collecting stickers, coins, and crystals. The more you gather in one turn, the higher your combo and bonuses!

4. Triggers:
Collect special icons (magnet, x2, freeze, etc.) to power up the ball or alter sticker behavior. For example, "Ghost" lets the ball pass through triggers, while "Double Move" grants a second strike without new stickers appearing.

5. Buying Packs:
Before your first turn, choose a free Level 1 pack. Each pack contains 100 stickers, with 10 appearing per turn.

6. Strategy Tips:
Use "Freeze" or "Bonus" to increase the number of stickers on the field.
Combine triggers like "Magnet" + "x2" for double rewards.
Prioritize Holo-stickers - they grant x2 coins!

games.title: Run The Electricity
games.description:
Run The Electricity is a unique puzzle game that combines simplicity and benefits for your mind. It is designed to give relaxation, help to cope with stress and improve concentration.

Instead of intense gameplay and a race against time, a calm process awaits you here: you just need to connect lines, lamps and energy sources in a closed circuit to turn on the light.

Minimalistic design, smooth animation and soothing music create an atmosphere of complete tranquility comparable to yoga. This is not just a game, but a means to meditate and combat anxiety. You can play it at home, on the road, or at work to distract yourself and restore your mental balance.

Smart puzzles train logic and imagination, and simple mechanics allow you to have fun from the first seconds. Discover a world of light, harmony and tranquility!
games.howToPlayText:
Playing this game is easy and enjoyable. All you need to do is tap on the lines and turn them until you get a closed electrical circuit.

For the light to come on, at least one lamp and a wire must be connected in it. As soon as this happens, the lines will shine, and you will get a feeling of completeness and tranquility.

Each puzzle takes only a few seconds, but it brings a lot of fun. This makes the game ideal for short pauses, trips, or waiting. You don't have to rush: the levels are unlimited in time, and you can solve them at your own pace.

With each new stage, the tasks become more interesting and diverse, training concentration and attention. Conduct Electricity will help to cope with anxiety, give positive emotions and become an excellent anti-stress remedy. Just open the game, start connecting the lines, and feel your mind calm down.

games.title: Bubble Tower
games.description:
Bubble Tower 3D is a relaxing 3D bubble-pop / color-match puzzle game.
You rotate a tower (or cylinder) loaded with colored bubbles around its vertical axis.
Your goal is to shoot bubbles, matching colors to connect groups of the same color. When matched, those bubbles pop/drop off the tower.
There are many levels; difficulty increases as you go. More bubble colors, trickier arrangements, limited shots, etc.
Also there are diamonds or special gems you can collect in certain levels. These may unlock ‚Äúshiny shapes‚Äù or cosmetic things.
The graphics are clean, simple, and meant for relaxing casual play. It mixes mental challenge (where to shoot, color matching) with a soothing visual.
games.howToPlayText:
A tower appears with a cluster of bubbles of various colors. There‚Äôs a shooter that holds the next bubble to fire.
You can rotate the tower around (usually by dragging left/right or using onscreen controls) to bring bubbles of matching color in position.
Tap or drag to aim, then let go (or tap a location) to shoot the bubble toward the tower. Match it with other bubbles of the same color.
When you connect 3 or more bubbles of the same color, those bubbles pop/drop off. Bubbles that are hanging (i.e. no longer connected to the base or other bubbles) also fall off.
Some levels include diamonds or special gems placed in certain parts of the bubble structure. You need to target those, maybe by matching bubbles around them or popping surrounding bubbles to let them fall.
You win a level if all bubbles (or the required ones) are cleared. If you run out of shots (or fail to clear the required bubbles), you lose and must retry.

games.title: Connect Line
games.description:
Connect Lines is a puzzle game in which the goal is to rotate line-segments so that together they form a continuous connected path or network i.e. all the lines must join up into one single connected structure.
It is simple in appearance but grows challenging, because you must figure out the correct orientation of each piece so that the network is complete without any breaks.
As the puzzle advances, the arrangement / layout becomes more complex. The number of line-pieces increases, the shapes become more varied, and finding the correct connection scheme becomes harder. You may need to think ahead about how rotating one piece will affect connections with several adjacent pieces. (This is standard for these kinds of puzzles.)
games.howToPlayText:
Connect all lines into one unified path (or network). Every piece must be connected properly so there are no loose ends.
The board has many small line segments. These might be straight lines, curves, etc. Each segment is oriented in some way.
You can click on a line piece to rotate it. Each click usually rotates the piece by 90¬∞ (or possibly another fixed amount) to change its orientation.

games.title: Rotate Cups
games.description:
This is a rotation physics puzzle game where you control the angle of cups to try to get the balls to roll into specific cups.
Rotate cups clockwise or counterclockwise as needed to turn the clear cups into ramps guiding the ball down the level.
Place at least one ball in each of the blue cups.
In this game you have to get all the balls into the blue cups lower down the screen.
Larger blue cups can hold more than one ball in them.
If there are multiple smaller blue cups you must get a ball into each of them.
Levels are not timed & you can both rotate as many times as you like & pause as many times as you like.

You can skip intermediary cups. On most levels you typically want to use all the cups on the way down, but if you are struggling to do so you can bump a ball off the outside of a cup or skip a cup entirely & it won‚Äôt harm you in the least provided your balls eventually get into the blue cups.
Some levels have a long reach you have to make the ball roll. On those levels sometimes a somewhat rapid cup spin toward the destination is enough, but in some cases you have to do that rapid spin as the starting point & then slightly spin back quickly right as the ball is leaving to give the ball a bit more lift.
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop:
Use your mouse left click button to select on the screen & drag your mouse to rotate the cups.
Drag left or down to spin clockwise.
Drag right or up to spin counterclockwise.

Touchscreen devices:
Tap the screen with a finger & drag your finger across the screen to rotate cups clockwise or counterclockwise.

games.title: Laser Survivor
games.description:
Laser Survivor, a cyberpunk roguelike action-adventure set in a neon-drenched post-apocalypse, the last hope for humanity rests in the hands of five heroes fighting hordes of demons pouring through a dimensional rift. Featuring pixel art visuals, randomized weapons, chiptune soundtracks, and relentless survival gameplay, every run is a test of adaptation and skill.

Story
The world has fallen. A dimensional rift has unleashed an unstoppable flood of demons, tearing through what remains of civilization. But from the chaos, five warriors rise. Each wielding unique powers forged for survival in this cyberpunk hellscape. Dropped at random into corrupted maps, they must adapt with whatever weapons and passive abilities they find, carving their path through waves of enemies, unlocking upgrades, and uncovering the truth behind the rift. The fate of Earth depends on them.

Heroes
Blaze: Fires homing bullets that lock onto the nearest enemy, ensuring no demon can escape.
Neon: Projects a protective energy shield that damages anything foolish enough to get close.
Hunter: Drops explosives that create deadly zones, controlling the battlefield with traps.
Slash: Slices enemies apart with razor-sharp horizontal cuts that pierce entire hordes.
Jaxx: A cyber-brute with massive, scaling area damage, crushing everything in his path.


Features
Cyberpunk Roguelike Gameplay: Every run is unique, with randomized spawn points, weapons, and abilities.
5 Maps to Conquer: Battle through the Lab, Forest, Crypt, Factory, and Dungeon, each swarming with demon hordes.
10 Active Weapons & 10 Passive Abilities: Build your arsenal on the fly as you adapt to randomized loadouts.
8 Missions & 11 Upgrades: Progress through challenging missions, earn permanent upgrades, and unlock new survival tactics.
Collectibles & Lore: Discover secrets that reveal the origins of the rift and the story behind the invasion.
Retro Pixel Art: Neon-infused visuals with hand-crafted pixel art and gameplay by the Felicity team.
80s Chiptune Soundtrack: Pulsating tracker music by Drozerix, driving the action with nostalgic energy.

Why Play Laser Survivor?
Fast-paced roguelike survival set in a sci-fi cyberpunk apocalypse.
Play as five unique heroes, each with distinct base abilities and upgrade paths.
Endless replayability with randomized runs and evolving builds.
Perfect for fans of pixel art shooters, bullet-hell roguelikes, and retro-inspired chiptune soundtracks.

Laser Survivor is more than survival. It‚Äôs humanity‚Äôs last stand in a cyberpunk post-apocalypse. Will you master the chaos, close the rift, and save the world... or be consumed by the demons?

games.title: Foxy Eco Sort
games.description:
Join Foxy and Raccoon on their eco-mission! Sort waste, play match-3 and matching pairs to clean polluted locations. 

But it's not just cleaning! Uncover the conspiracy of cunning Ratty who wants to destroy the forest. Complete story chapters: track garbage trucks, expose arsonists and save your home!

Features:
üåø Waste sorting - learn to separate waste: glass, plastic, paper and organics.
üåé Clean up locations - each cleaned area becomes more beautiful, and the rescued animals rejoice!
ü¶ù Complete the story line by uncovering the cunning rat's conspiracies.
ü¶ä Funny characters - Foxy the fox will tell you why sorting is important, and the raccoon... well, he's still lazy, but he'll get it!
üòÇ Funny dialogues - the characters won't let you get bored, their communication will cheer you up!

Ready to save the planet? Then go ahead - Foxy and the raccoon are already waiting for you! ‚ôªÔ∏èü¶ùü¶ä

P.S. The game is made with love for nature and good jokes. Enjoy the game!
games.howToPlayText:
1. Sort Waste Correctly
Drag items to their matching categories: cardboard to cardboard, plastic to plastic, glass to glass, organic to organic.

2. Play "Match-3"
Combine three identical elements to clear the field.

3. Find Pairs
Flip cards and match eco-themed pairs. Train your memory and help clean the forest!

games.title: Millionaire Life
games.description: After a rough start, you've hit the jackpot, won the lottery and now go wild! Live out your wildest RICH dreams! Indulge in lavish spending, fulfill your biggest dreams, and embrace a life of over-the-top luxury with no regrets. Live the Millionaire Life! Start from humble beginnings and rise to the extravagant lifestyle of your dreams. Spend big on flashy cars, luxury mansions, and golden accessories as you show the world your fortune. In this fun and over-the-top casual game, your goal is simple: live lavishly, make bold choices, and embrace the most outrageous version of wealth imaginable. Unlock new items, upgrade your lifestyle, and become the ultimate symbol of success!
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop Controls:

Mouse Click: Interact with buttons, menus, and purchase options.

Drag with Mouse: Move objects, unlock items, and complete tasks.

Mobile Controls:

Tap: Interact with items, buttons, and upgrade options.

Swipe/Drag: Collect, move, or place items to progress.

games.title: Unravel Eggs Puzzle
games.description: Celebrate Easter weekend in style this year with the sweet new puzzle game, Unravel Eggs Puzzle! Complete each level by untangling eggs such that each line connecting eggs is not intersected by any other line connecting eggs. Warm up with some light puzzles and work your way up to an egg-tangling like you've never seen! Happy Easter!
games.howToPlayText:
Grab an egg:
Touch and drag an egg to move it around the screen.

Reposition to avoid intersections:
Adjust positions so that none of the connecting lines between eggs cross each other. All lines must be ‚Äúuntangled.‚Äù

Change color to green:
When the arrangement has no intersecting lines, the eggs and the lines turn green, meaning the level is solved.

games.title: Toytopia
games.description: Toytopia is a cozy merge game where you are tasked to combine and produce art materials which you can use to fix broken toys. Each toy presents a unique challenge and difficulty.
games.howToPlayText: In Toytopia, you simply need to fix the broken parts of a toy by merging art items to produce the required art materials. Use the mouse cursor (desktop) or finger (mobile) to drag and drop items on the board.
